1. HYDROARC WARNINGS IN FORCE AS OF 051524Z APR.
   ALL THE INFORCE WARNINGS ARE LISTED HERE.
   48/2024, 44/2024, 42/2024, 41/2024, 23/2024.
   272/2023, 270/2023, 269/2023, 259/2023, 258/2023,
   254/2023, 243/2023, 240/2023, 239/2023, 178/2023,
   163/2023, 162/2023, 157/2023, 156/2023, 155/2023.
   293/2022, 291/2022, 262/2022, 260/2022, 235/2022,
   228/2022, 224/2022, 223/2022, 198/2022, 175/2022.
   208/2021, 207/2021.
2. THE COMPLETE TEXT OF ALL IN-FORCE HYDROARC
   BROADCAST WARNINGS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE NGA
   MARITIME SAFETY INFORMATION WEBSITE AT:
   MSI.NGA.MIL/NAVWARNINGS.
   ALTERNATIVELY, THESE MAY BE REQUESTED BY E-MAIL
   FROM NGA AT NAVSAFETY@NGA.MIL.
3. CANCEL HYDROARC 43/24.
